Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on purported guidelines that were not issued by the Sri Lanka IDH and were labeled as "fake news" by the Health Promotion Bureau.

Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the guidelines issued by the IDH are valid and reliable, when in fact they were debunked as "fake news" by the Health Promotion Bureau.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the guidelines were not issued by the IDH and were labeled as "fake news" by the Health Promotion Bureau.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration bias in the provided claim.
